description:
Take some royalty with you on your next trip. Knights, kings and queens pack up no problem in this portable chess set. Magnetic pieces, a nylon pouch, and compact design make it a no brainer for beach trips, backpack excursions, and road trips.

  • Magnetic game pieces
  • For 2 players
  • Set includes board, game pieces, pouch and carabiner
name: Outside Inside Basecamp Magnetic Chess/Checkers
